arStrings.szText: Youâ€™re the heretic the Knights are after! I could use someone like you. A dying Knight mistook me for his confessor. He spoke of... sacrilegious things.
He said his party of Knights found a secret to eternal life. A Red Chalice. He said the Bishop leading them ordered them to drink of it, deep.
He confessed they shelter now in a place he called the Sanguine Chapel. I'd see that Chalice destroyed. Would you retrieve it?
